name: Desert Storm Zombies
description:
Desert Storm Zombies is a Single player zombie survival shooter set in Afghanistan.

In Desert Storm Zombies the goal is to survive as long as possible and get as much points as possible! so YOU can be the number one player in Desert Strom Zombies.

Gameplay Features

  1.  Player (Shooting, Running, Walking, Jumping,Aiming)
  2. Zombie(Idle,Chaising,Attacking)

Aesthetic

The aesthetic is how we think a zombie apocalypse would look like if it was to hit afghanistan
